clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Novel Gastric Space Occupying Device
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Centre 30-day Observational Non-randomised Study to Evaluate Preliminary Safety and Efficacy of a Novel Gastric Space Occupying Device as an Aid for Weight Loss

brief_summary.textblock: This will be an observational, prospective, non-randomized, pilot study to gain initial device experience on a novel space-occupying device in persons who are overweight or obese. No formal hypothesis testing will be conducted.

study_pop.textblock: Patients will be selected from a community sample that satisfy the inclusion/exclusion criteria.
